bib.title: WebSty-an Open Web-based System for Exploring Stylometric Structures in Document Collections.
bib.author: Piasecki, Maciej and Walkowiak, Tomasz and Eder, Maciej
bib.abstract: Computer-assisted text analysis is now witnessing the phenomenon of ever-growing computer power and, more importantly, an unprecedented aggregation of textual data. Certainly, it gives us an unique opportunity to see more than our predecessors, but at the same time it presents non-trivial challenges. To name but a few, these include information retrieval, data analysis, classification, genre recognition, sentiment analysis, and many others. It can be said that, after centuries of producing textual data and decades of
